trans-unit.source: Advanced login has moved to the '[[SpiderOak_Blue]]' app, and we must switch this app from the alternate, [[server]], to the standard server, [[standardServer]]. To continue using this functionality, please download the '[[SpiderOak_Blue]]' app. This dialog will appear at app start until you authorize the change.
trans-unit.target: Advanced login has moved to the '{{SpiderOak_Blue}}' app, and we must switch this app from the alternate, {{server}}, to the standard server, {{standardServer}}. To continue using this functionality, please download the '{{SpiderOak_Blue}}' app. This dialog will appear at app start until you authorize the change.

trans-unit.source: Sorry. You should still be able to access your favorites, but logging in and access to files or folders requires a network connection.
trans-unit.target: Sorry! You should still be able to access your favorites, but logging in and access to files or folders requires a network connection.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to refresh all of your favorites? This will re-download the latest versions.
trans-unit.target: Do you want to refresh all of your favorites? This will re-download the latest versions.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to add this file to your favorites? This will download the contents to your device.
trans-unit.target: Do you want to add this file to your favorites? This will download the contents to your device.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to remove this file from your favorites?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to remove this file from your favorites?

trans-unit.source: We apologize, but you must first complete your account setup using the [[SpiderOak]] desktop software. This is necessary so that proper cryptographic keys can be generated to keep your data private. Please open [[SpiderOak]] on your computer to continue. Thank you. -- The [[SpiderOak]] Team
trans-unit.target: We apologize, but you must first complete your account setup using the {{SpiderOak}} desktop software. This is necessary so that proper cryptographic keys can be generated to keep your data private. Please open {{SpiderOak}} on your computer to continue. Thank you. -- The {{SpiderOak}} Team
